definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
Beijing, Shanghai and Guangzhou/abbr. for 北京、上海、廣州|北京、上海、广州
Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou and Shenzhen/abbr. for 北京、上海、廣州、深圳|北京、上海、广州、深圳

sentences.english: Occurrence of eyebrow cloud band means that typhoon will move toward north.
sentences.chinese: 眉狀雲帶是颱風北上的重要特徵雲系。

sentences.english: Why do not you come up to Scotland for a few days ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼不北上到蘇格蘭來住幾天？

sentences.english: After a short stay, they again set out towards the north, making a rough chart of the shores they saw.
sentences.chinese: 稍作停留繼續北上，對沿途的海岸繪製了簡單的海圖。

sentences.english: It will arrive in Germany, in the north and all over Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他會抵達德國，然後北上直到整個歐洲。

sentences.english: Caesar marched north into the forests that border the Danube River.
sentences.chinese: 愷撒揮師北上，深入到多瑙河沿岸的森林地帶。

sentences.english: The vessel still continued her course northward along the coast, till they anchored in Moreton Bay.
sentences.chinese: 稍作停留繼續北上，對沿途的海岸繪製了簡單的海圖。

sentences.english: After conference of abide by justice, he is restored post, lead troop day is fought on north.
sentences.chinese: 遵義會議以後，他被恢復職務，帶領部隊北上抗日。

sentences.english: They go north along the west coast, to enjoy the hot springs in Yangmingshan National Park.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿着西岸北上，到陽明山國家公園享受溫泉。

sentences.english: He took trains as far north as he could, then rented a motorbike.
sentences.chinese: 他搭乘火車儘可能地北上，然後租了一輛摩托車。

sentences.english: He led it to the far north and attacked the tribes that lived by the River Danube.
sentences.chinese: 他率領他們北上攻打生活在多瑙河畔的部族。

sentences.english: At the same time, Meade moved his army north.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，米德也正率兵北上。

sentences.english: When the University intends to north PubMed, Nanjing is my preferred city.
sentences.chinese: 大學時候，打算北上考研，南京是我首選的城市。

sentences.english: Tapping on the compass in the upper right-hand corner of the screen realigns you northward.
sentences.chinese: 攻絲的羅盤在右上角的屏幕重新調整你北上。

definition: to set out (of troops)/departure/start date (of military expedition)
land route/to go by surface transport
to seize control of (an enemy position)/(fig.) to take by storm/to gain (awards, control of a market etc)
(of troops) to depart for/to head for
to follow up a victory/to pursue retreating enemy
